# ulam spiral as code

```
# ulam.c; generated by ulam.py 19;
# ulam.py 19 > ulam.c
# clang -o ulam ulam.c; ./ulam
              .       .   .       .
.           .                   .
  .       .   .
                .   .           .
  .   .       .               .
                .   .       .
      .   .           .   .   .

              .   .   .

      .   .   .
        .       .
```
